publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1226 Mr Adam Ingram: Independent Clinical Research Trials-That the Parliament notes the recent report published by the Scottish Association for Mental Health, All you need to know? Scottish Survey of People's Experience of Psychiatric Drugs, which highlights the serious concerns of service users regarding unwanted side effects from their prescribed medication such as anti-depressants and endorses the recommendation that the government establishes an independent body to perform clinical trials.
